thread.section_title: ChinaFlower214 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 ChinaFlower214 的点评意见 | www.chinaflower214.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
Beginning in about 2009-2010 chinaflower 214.com has been a consistently reliable flower delivery service for me.
PROS:
- Reliable & no headaches.
- Best service of its type for sending international flower orders to China (so consistent that I quit comparing products and pricing with similar companies.)
- Consistently good customer support & multilingual
- Quick and accurate feedback & receipts
- Quality flowers & attractive arrangements
- Timely delivery
- Good price point
- Account privacy: so far, so good with safely maintaining my records
- PayPal (newest) is a clean-cut, no hassles payment option.
CONS:
- Skrill = terrible payment fulfillment! Even with authorizing a new card or account they (Skrill) still manages to screw-up their side of things. However, SKRILL does have good customer service and conscientious service people. The apparent problem is in Skrill's card-authorization-handling protocols. Consistent problem in 2016, and again 2017 (Valentine's Day.)
